statements.select: Select ca.category_code, ca.category_name, ca.category_version as category_version_value, co.content_name, co.content_desc, co.content_type, co.content_text, co.content_created_time, co.content_start_time, co.content_end_time, co.content_status , co.content_code, co.content_sort_id, co.content_version as content_version_value, category_parent_code = (SELECT category_code FROM oss_category WHERE category_id = ca.category_parent_id) FROM oss_content co JOIN oss_category ca ON co.category_id = ca.category_id WHERE ca.category_code = #value# AND ca.category_status = 0 AND co.content_status = 0 AND co.content_start_time <= getdate() AND co.content_end_time >= getdate() Order by co.content_sort_id
